message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"please come in","sentence":"请进。","image_prompt":"A cozy room with a softly glowing open door. A friendly hand is gesturing to invite someone in, with a warm, inviting lamp on a table. The outside world beyond the door has a gentle, soft apocalyptic feel, with slightly faded colors and subtle overgrown plants, as if the world outside is quiet and slowed, but inside is safe and welcoming. Animation style is soft, gentle, and lightly dreamlike.","sentence_translation":"Please come in."}
